Package org.neo4j.internal.batchimport.cache

Class BaseNumberArray<N extends NumberArray<N>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.internal.batchimport.cache.BaseNumberArray<N>

    HeapNumberArray, OffHeapNumberArray

extends Object
implements NumberArray<N>
    Contains basic functionality of fixed size number arrays.

    • Method Detail

      • at

        public N at​(long index)
        Description copied from interface: NumberArray
        Part of the nature of NumberArray is that NumberArray.length() can be dynamically growing. For that to work some implementations (those coming from e.g NumberArrayFactory.newDynamicIntArray(long, int, org.neo4j.memory.MemoryTracker) and such dynamic calls) has an indirection, one that is a bit costly when comparing to raw array access. In scenarios where there will be two or more access to the same index in the array it will be more efficient to resolve this indirection once and return the "raw" array for that given index so that it can be used directly in multiple calls, knowing that the returned array holds the given index.
        Specified by:
        at in interface NumberArray<N extends NumberArray<N>>
        Parameters:
        index - index into the array which the returned array will contain.
        Returns:
        array sure to hold the given index.

      • rebase

        protected long rebase​(long index)
        Utility for rebasing an external index to internal index.
        Parameters:
        index - external index.
        Returns:
        index into internal data structure.
